creator: james_thomas@enovia.com
text:
Well, I tried posting this as a question to the tomcat-user mailing list but 
did not get a response.  So, I'll submit this question as a potential bug.  Is 
there something else I should have tried?

Anyway, on to the issue:

Using IBM JDK 1.1.8 and Tomcat 3.3: tomcat cannot load web application jar 
files.  A MalformedURLException is thrown with the message "unknown protocol: 
jar".  I understand why this happens and even have an idea on how to solve the 
problem but before I go through all that trouble I need to know if JDK 1.1 is 
suppose to be supported?

Thanks.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Please include the stack trace and more messages. 1.1 is supposed to work.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Fixed, by adding a minimal jar: handler that allows creation of URLs.
